description: This file defines Express.js routes for menu management in a food ordering backend. It sets up endpoints for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting menu items, with some routes protected by authentication and admin authorization middleware. Swagger annotations document the API endpoints.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles listing menu items based on query parameters.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a specific menu item by ID.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new menu item; restricted to admin users.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing menu item by ID; restricted to admin users.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Deletes a menu item by ID; restricted to admin users.
